name: Undead (itch)
description:
What is Undead ?

Undead is a little prototype of a Twin Stick Zombie Shooter, you play as John Weller ex miolitary and now bodyguard.

Your abjective is to survive and get to the nearest safe zone, and for that you will have your best friend with you, your gun ! Kill thoses zombies and get to safety and everything will be ok !

How to play

Keyboard and mouse (not recommended)

ZQSD to move (yes in France we have AZERTY keyboards)
P to activate the mouse
Left click to shoot
A to use a medkit
R to reload
Escaoe to pause

Gamepad

Left stick : movements
Right stick to rotate
RT to shoot
B to use a medkit
X to reload
Pause to .... Pause

Menu can only be used with a mouse

This game is and will stay a prototype, my objective here is to try and create things to learn new things and being always up to dates on GameDev
